title: How do I update my phone?
answer:
![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150707125951720001.png)

Back up important data, such as your contacts, messages, and call log, before the update.

l   Online update: Before the update, make sure your phone has Internet access.

Go to the **Settings** screen, touch **Updater**, and follow the onscreen instructions.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150707125951649002.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150707125951410003.jpg)

l   Local update: Download the update package from [http://consumer.huawei.com](http://consumer.huawei.com/ " ") and save the **dload** folder in the update package to the phone storage's root directory.

Go to the **Settings** screen, touch **Updater** > **Local update**, and follow the onscreen instructions. For details, see the update guide for the update package.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150707125951649002.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150707125951845004.jpg)

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150707125951647005.png)

The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
